hibernate-mapping.query: UPDATE com.mg.merp.warehouse.model.SerialNum wsn SET wsn.OutComeDocSpecId = NULL WHERE wsn.Batch = :stockBatch AND wsn.OutComeDocSpecId = :docSpecId
UPDATE com.mg.merp.warehouse.model.SerialNum wsn SET wsn.OutComeDocSpecId = :docSpecId WHERE wsn.Batch = :stockBatch AND wsn.SerialNum IN (:numbers)
DELETE FROM com.mg.merp.warehouse.model.SerialNum wsn WHERE wsn.Batch = :stockBatch AND wsn.InComeDocSpecId = :docSpecId

SELECT DISTINCT bl, cat.Code FROM com.mg.merp.warehouse.model.BinLocation bl LEFT JOIN bl.BinLocationDetails bld LEFT JOIN bld.StockBatch sb LEFT JOIN sb.StockCard sc LEFT JOIN sc.Catalog cat WHERE bl = :binLocation AND bl.Warehouse = :warehouse

SELECT SUM(bld.Quantity) FROM com.mg.merp.warehouse.model.BinLocation bl LEFT JOIN bl.BinLocationDetails bld LEFT JOIN bld.StockBatch sb LEFT JOIN sb.StockCard sc LEFT JOIN sc.Catalog cat WHERE bl = :binLocation AND bl.Warehouse = :warehouse AND cat.UpCode = :catalogCode AND bld.Kind = :kind

SELECT bld.BinLocation, bld.StockBatch, bld.Quantity, (SELECT SUM(bld2.Quantity) FROM com.mg.merp.warehouse.model.BinLocationDetail bld2 WHERE bld2.Kind = 1 AND bld2.StockBatch = :stockBatch) FROM com.mg.merp.warehouse.model.BinLocationDetail bld WHERE bld.Kind = 0 AND bld.StockBatch = :stockBatch
DELETE FROM com.mg.merp.warehouse.model.BinLocationDetail bld WHERE bld.StockBatch = :stockBatch AND bld.DocSpecId = :docSpecId AND bld.Kind = 1
DELETE FROM com.mg.merp.warehouse.model.BinLocationDetail bld WHERE bld.StockBatch = :stockBatch AND bld.DocSpecId = :docSpecId AND bld.Kind = 0
